text: The Wolf Man is a 1941 American horror movie. The movie stars Lon Chaney Jr. The Wolf Man was the first movie in a franchise of five movies based on the character Larry Talbot. During the course of the movie, Talbot is turned into a werewolf. Category:1941 movies Category:1940s horror movies Category:American horror movies Category:Werewolves in movies Category:Movies directed by George Waggner
title: The Wolf Man (1941 movie)
